parameters.filePath: ={{ $('Set GitHub Details').item.json.repo_workflows_path }}{{ $node['Edit for Upload'].json.folderPath ? '/' + $node['Edit for Upload'].json.folderPath : '' }}/{{ $node['Edit for Upload'].json.fileName }}

parameters.content:
## CHECK WHICH IS NEWER

**IF TRUE** github workflow is the most recent, n8n to be updated

**IF FALSE** n8n workflow is the most recent, github to be updated

parameters.filePath: ={{ $('Set GitHub Details').item.json.repo_workflows_path }}{{ $node['Edit for Update'].json.folderPath ? '/' + $node['Edit for Update'].json.folderPath : '' }}/{{ $node['Edit for Update'].json.fileName }}
={{ $('Set GitHub Details').item.json.repo_workflows_path }}{{ $node['Edit for Move'].json.folderPath ? '/' + $node['Edit for Move'].json.folderPath : '' }}/{{ $node['Edit for Move'].json.fileName }}

parameters.content:
## IF ONLY IN N8N
Update GitHub with the relevant workflows

## IF ONLY IN GITHUB
Create new workflow in n8n

parameters.jsonOutput: ={{ (() => { try { const decoded = $json.content ? JSON.parse($json.content.base64Decode()) : {}; return { ...decoded, _githubPath: $json.path }; } catch(e) { return { _githubPath: $json.path }; } })() }}
